text: The district of Obersimmental in the Swiss canton of Bern has 4 municipalities in an area of 334 km². The municipality of Zweisimmen is the district capital, with the prefect residing at Blankenburg Castle. Municipality Population (Dec 2007) Area (km²) Boltigen 1,405 77.0 Lenk 2,325 123.1 St. Stephan 1,362 60.9 Zweisimmen 2,913 73.1 == References == Obersimmental
title: Obersimmental District
